issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run test 1043 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
View is drawn with left = 0

Expected Result:
View should be shifted 10 units to the right
fields.summary: Android: assigning left value is not getting drawn with the view shifted to the right

comments.body:
The view is drawn 10 units from the left.
Verified on:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0.201206010843
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120602010244
Android Emulator 2.2
Android Runtime: v8
